text.text: Tyrannosaurus, sometimes referred to as Tyrannosaurus rex or T-rex, is the most easily recognizable dinosaurs, a major American find, it has been the antagonist of many films to date. Most famously, it was the icon for the Jurassic Park movies and books*.

Tyrannosaurus is often seen as a large lizard-like creature due to its popularity in media before we learned many non-avian dinosaurs, mainly theropods, had feathers. Though it is debated to the extent of the coverage, it's widely concitered
